upgradeentry.rollover: [[14975071]]Allows Shamans to restore the energy of a friendly unit to full.[[]]

[[14952888]]Enables Shamans to cast Fatigue on enemy units that use energy, decreasing their energy by #GetClassInt('Forester_Shaman', 'fatigue_damage')# and dealing them such an amount of damage.[[]]

[[15015680]]Enables Sprites to move unseen among enemy ranks.[[]]
[[15058259]]Increases the Rangers' health points by #GetClassInt('Forester_Ranger', 'strength_upgrade_hp_bonus')#.[[]]
[[15075791]]Provides Rangers with the ability to hit their targets in critical areas, causing them to be healed 50% slower.[[]]
[[archery3]]This unit has a chance to deal double damage to enemy unit.[[]]
[[15139543]]Increases the Clodhoppers' armour by #GetClassInt('Forester_Clodhopper', 'armor_upgrade_bonus')#.[[]]
[[15156765]]Allows Clodhoppers to stun multiple units with Light armour with their attacks.[[]]
[[15171774]]Enables the Hunters' weapons to inflict #GetClassInt('Forester_Hunter', 'moonblade_damage')# additional damage to the first unit they hit.[[]]
[[15192176]]Enables Wolf Masters to throw their knives from a distance.[[]]
[[26107799]]Increases the maximum number of wolves a Wolf Master can have and enables Wolf Masters to summon additional wolves much faster.[[]]
[[15237914]]Enables Wolf Masters to inflict critical strikes of #GetClassInt('Forester_WolfMaster', 'bloodlust_damage')# damage against Mounted units.[[]]
[[15247915]]Enables Werewolves to gain health equal to their energy when they damage an enemy, In additionaly makes them stronger.[[]]
[[16877142]]Increases the movement and attack speed of Swordsmen by #GetClassInt('Human_Swordsman', 'stamina_speed_bonus')#%.[[]]
[[17074851]]Allows Squires to move in complete silence, making them invisible for enemies until they attack.[[]]
[[16931516]]Increases the speed of your cavalry units by 20% and their health by #GetClassInt('Human_Cavalry','adv_armor_health_bonus')#.[[]]
[[16931516]]Increases the speed of your cavalry units by 20% and their health by #GetClassInt('Human_Cavalry','adv_armor_health_bonus')#.[[]]

[[16853093]]Enables Longbowmen to deal 1-#GetClassInt('Human_Longbowman', 'explosivearrow_damage_max')# additional damage to buildings.[[]]
[[16914314]]Doubles the Longbowmen's range.[[]]
[[16792141]]Improves the Pikemen's training to fight in town, tripling their damage when near friendly buildings.[[]]
[[16894973]]Increases the Pikemen's damage against mounted units by #GetClassInt('Human_Pikeman', 'reinforced_spear_damage')#.[[]]
[[17024042]]Enables Paladins to use a special attack that instantly kills any enemy with less than #GetClassInt('Human_Paladin', 'death_blow_health_percent')#% health.[[]]
[[16997777]]Allows Paladins to increase the damage of nearby allied warriors by #GetClassInt('Human_Paladin', 'leadership_percent')#% each time the Paladin kills an enemy.[[]]
[[17040330]]Provides Oracles with a spell that deals #GetClassInt('Human_Oracle','exorcism_damage')# area damage to summoned units and illusions.[[]]
[[holyarmour]]Provides Oracles with the Holy Armour spell, which doesn't allow a unit to receive more than #GetClassInt('Human_Oracle', 'holyshield_damagemax')# damage per hit.
[[16974945]]Enables Monks to steal life energy from enemy units and transfer it to nearby friendly units in Light armour.[[]]
[[17012452]]Renders cursed units incapable of defending themselves, making their armour value negative.In additional making both witch and the shadow mistress stronger.[[]]
[[17012452]]Renders cursed units incapable of defending themselves, making their armour value negative.In additional making both witch and the shadow mistress stronger.[[]]
[[26275499]]Increases the lifetime of Spirits to #GetClassInt('Darkling_Spirit', 'spirit_bond_lifetime') / 1000# seconds.[[]]
[[]]Increases the lifetime of Gold Spirits to #GetClassInt('Darkling_GoldSpirit', 'spirit_bond_lifetime') / 1000# seconds.
[[13100590]]Provides Dark Mages with the ability to raise Spirits from the bodies of fallen units. Spirits are summoned units with a limited lifetime.[[]]
[[13222082]]Increases the Disciples' health by #GetClassInt('Darkling_Disciple', 'strengthoffaith_bonus')#.[[]]

[[13248433]]Provides Disciples with a chance to cast thunderbolts upon their enemies with the help of their battle prayers. Each thunderbolt takes #GetClassInt('Darkling_Disciple', 'thundercall_damage')#% of the target's health points.[[]]
[[26315505]]Returns half the gold spent for the training of a Disciple when he falls in battle.[[]]
[[26323704]]Returns half the gold spent for the training of a Fanatic when he falls in battle.[[]]

[[13269346]]Enhances the Apostle of Death's weapon allowing him to deprive an enemy unit from its energy as well as deal #GetClassInt('Darkling_ApostleOfDeath', 'aether_blade_damage')# damage per attack.[[]]

[[13286022]]Allows the Apostle of Death's ethereal body to remain after his death for #GetClassInt('Darkling_ApostleOfDeath', 'afterlife_timeout') / 1000# seconds, dealing #GetClassInt('Darkling_ApostleOfDeath', 'afterlife_damage')# damage per second to all nearby enemies. In additionaly giving them +100 health points.[[]]
[[13306003]]Enables the Dark Rider to redirect healing energy from enemy healers to himself. Also substantially increases his regeneration rate. In additionaly makes them stronger.[[]]
[[13328080]]Provides Dark Riders with the ability to stun their enemies with the first attack.[[]]
[[13120771]]Enables the Evacuate mode of Stoneshapers. In this mode, the Meteors envelop dying units and teleport them back to your base. In addition makes them stronger.[[]]

[[upgElfArcher2]]Enable the Elven Archers to increase their damage by #GetClassInt('Elves_Archer', 'unity_bonus')# for each other Elven Archer in his sight, with a maximum of #GetClassInt('Elves_Archer', 'unity_max')#.[[]]

[[upgElfRider2]]Enable the Elven Goat Riders to increase their attack and movement speed by #GetClassInt('Elves_HorseArcher', 'encouragement_bonus')#% for each other Goat Rider in his sight with a maximum of #GetClassInt('Elves_HorseArcher', 'encouragement_max')#%.[[]]
[[upgHorseHunters2]]Increases Nomad Spearman's speed by #GetClassInt('Nomad_Spearman', 'hunter_bonus_speed')#% and his health by #GetClassInt('Nomad_Spearman', 'hunter_bonus_health')#.[[]]

[[upgPlundering2]]Enables the Beastmaster to salvage #GetClassInt('Nomad_Cavalry', 'plunder_attack')# Gold for each time he hits an enemy building and #GetClassInt('Nomad_Cavalry', 'plunder_destroy')# each time he destroys a building. In addition grants +#GetClassInt('Nomad_Cavalry', 'plunder_armor')# armor.[[]]

[[upgchamppoison2]]Enable the Shade Archer to inflict #GetClassInt('Shades_Bowman', 'champpoison_damage')# poison damage for #GetClassInt('Shades_Bowman', 'champpoison_duration')/1000# seconds to Heroes only and slows down their healing by 50%.[[]]

[[upgShadTac2]]Gives the Shade Warrior, in addition to his damage reduction while moving, also #GetClassInt('Shades_Warrior', 'bottle_o_fog_reduction')# damage reduction while he is standing/fighting.[[]]
[[upgWeakAcid2]]Enables the Wyrm to render his target more vulnerable to damage by #GetClassInt('Dragons_GreenDragon', 'acid_vulnerabilty_increase')#%.[[]]

[[upgBurningWings2]]Gives the Red Dragon the ability to activate 'Burning Wings': His movement speed gets increased by #GetClassInt('Dragons_RedDragon', 'burning_wings_speed')#%, attack speed by #GetClassInt('Dragons_RedDragon', 'burning_wings_atkspeed')#% but he takes #GetClassInt('Dragons_RedDragon', 'burning_wings_damage')# damage per second while it is activated.[[]]
[[upgsmash2]]Enables the Small Troll to roll into enemies inflicting #GetClassInt('Trolls_SmallTroll', 'smash_roll_damage')# damage and stunning units in a small area.[[]]

[[upgraze2]]Gives the Mountain Troll bonus damage of #GetClassInt('Trolls_MountainTroll', 'extra_raze_damage')# against Buildings. In addition grants +#GetClassInt('Trolls_MountainTroll', 'raze_armor')# armor.[[]]
